name: TabletopAudio
0:
”Alexa, tell Tabletop Audio to play Wild West Saloon.”
”Alexa, ask Tabletop Audio what are the latest tracks?”
”Alexa, ask Tabletop Audio what track is this?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tabletop audio
des:
*** UPDATE 2.0***
-- Now available in the U.K., Canada, Australia, and India!
-- Build a playlist!
-- Repeat the playlist!
-- Shuffle the playlist!
-- Play tracks by category!
"Alexa, ask Tabletop Audio for help" to learn more.

*** UPDATE 1.1***
-- Now supports looping!

Thanks to everyone for the great feedback!

TabletopAudio.com is the premier advertising-free, free-to-use, and user-supported ambient game audio site on the web. It has been nominated for the prestigious ENnie awards every year since its launch and was awarded a 'Best Website' ENnie in 2015. Each year millions of tracks are played and downloaded on/from the site and the site is entirely supported by its users.

Tabletop Audio is for: role-players, boardgamers, writers, coders, artists, graphic designers, teachers, house-cleaners, lucid dreamers, gym-rats, distance runners, commuters and ANYONE who wants to immerse themselves in the audio-space of one environment, while physically inhabiting another.

And now it's available with Alexa! Check out tabletopaudio.com for a complete list of tracks or ask "What are the latest tracks?"

Please send questions, comments, and feedback to contact@invocate.io
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
